Name: Hades
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Bident of the Underworld

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend characteristic of 0.

Enemy formations within 3” of this model are considered to have a Will Characteristic of 0. In addition, once per battle in the Tactics Step this model can elect to use its Helm of Darkness. Until the end of the round this model may not be affected by or selected as the target of any attacks or abilities.

Whenever this model is selected to fight in the Melee Combat Step, if all this model’s attacks target a Formation composed of a single model, then increase the Damage Characteristic of the melee profile of this model’s Bident of the Underworld by 2.

Spells.Name: Blaze of Hellfire (35)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy model within 9” of this model and roll 2D6. If the result equals or exceeds the health characteristic of the selected model, then the selected model is immediately slain.
